name: Zamberlan 900 Rolle Evo 2 Gore-Tex Hiking Boots - Men's
description: From the West Coast Trail to the Sentier du Fjord Trail to the Camino de Santiago, these boots keep your feet protected and supported where ever your hike or trek. Flex panels and a lowered back lock your foot in while allowing for a natural flex. The cushioning midsole keeps your feet stable, even when carrying moderate loads and the sticky Vibram rubber sole provides mountain goat-like sure-footedness.Perwanger® leather upper has a Hydrobloc® finish for water-resistance and durability.Waterproof-breathable GORE-TEX® membrane is thermo-sealed into a bootie, fixed to the upper and glued to the midsole.Flex panels improve ankle mobility for a more natural stride.PU toe cap adds durability and toe protection.Low-density polyurethane wedge midsole cushions and promotes a natural heel to toe transfer.Vibram® Curcuma outsole provides durable traction in a variety of terrain.
